document.full_text: francesca schiavone, the defending french open champion, pulled out a 1-6, 7-5, 7-5 victory over anastasia pavlyuchenkova.
document.title: schiavone recovers and outlasts pavlyuchenkova
lines_and_colors: francesca schiavone, the defending french open champion, pulled out a 1-6, 7-5, 7-5 victory over anastasia pavlyuchenkova.
